name: moor-web-client
description: Modern web client for mooR - a 21st century LambdaMOO implementation

scripts.build:deb: npm run build && mkdir -p debian-build && cp -r dist/* debian-build/
scripts.daemon:dev: cargo run -p moor-daemon -- ./moor-data --db development.db --import-format objdef --import ${MOOR_CORE:-cores/lambda-moor/src} --export development-export --export-format objdef --use-boolean-returns false --custom-errors true --use-uuobjids true
scripts.daemon:traced: cargo run --features trace_events -p moor-daemon -- ./moor-data --db development.db --import-format objdef --import ${MOOR_CORE:-cores/lambda-moor/src} --export development-export --export-format objdef --use-boolean-returns false --custom-errors true --use-uuobjids true --trace-output moor-trace.json
scripts.full:dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run daemon:dev" "npm run web-host:dev"
scripts.full:dev-traced: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run daemon:traced" "npm run web-host:dev"
scripts.full:build: npm run build && npm run web-host:build

author: Ryan Daum <ryan.daum@gmail.com>
